name: White Balance Analysis
description: Analyzes color temperature consistency across the image. AI images may show inconsistent white balance or unnatural color cast patterns.
algorithm: Gray World + Color Temperature Consistency Analysis
mechanism: Estimates white balance using gray world assumption and analyzes color temperature consistency across image regions.
parameters: Method: gray world, Region analysis: block-based
source: Van de Weijer et al. (2007), IEEE TIP
useCase: Detecting white balance inconsistencies in AI images
